description:
视频在线地址：http://v.youku.com/v_show/id_XNzE3MzI3NjIw.html

近日，中国青年政治学院学生自制视频《舌尖上的宿舍·泡面篇》在网上迅速走红。泡面本是最寻常无奇的食物，但这几个大学生高仿《舌尖2》的桥段，汤底、皮蛋肠、枸杞、甘草、玫瑰、白葡萄酒……这些佐食配泡面，让广大吃货朋友们感到了扑面而来的华丽感，视频搞笑、既大气磅礴又细腻煽情。

沪江小编：泡面的味道是不是让你想起了熟悉的宿舍？你喜欢吃泡面吗？你有没有尝过各种不同风味的泡面？来看看外媒评出十大最好吃的泡面吧！

10：Mama Shrimp Creamy Tom Yum Flavour Oriental Style Instant Noodles – ThailandMama牌东方风味泡面，鲜虾奶油汤姆百胜味（泰国）

It is the best Thai variety. The strong bite of the heat and the crisp citrus flavors are of authentic Tom Yum. The noodles are thin and almost crumble when chewed – the texture is different from any others on the list. The creaminess is not of dairy but a cream-like color from boiling shrimp.这是最好吃的泰国泡面。热腾腾的泡面，配上纯正百胜味的清新柑橘香，再加上几乎入口即化的细面条，口味堪称排名中最特别的。这款泡面的乳感并不是真正的乳制品、而是鲜虾熬煮出来的奶油色汤汁。

9: Paldo Kokomen Spicy Chicken Flavor – South KoreaPaldo Kokomen牌辣鸡肉味泡面（韩国）

Kokomen Is a South Korean instant ramyun. It has a great jalapeno chicken kind of flavor. Kokomen是一种韩国泡面，它有着一种强烈的墨西哥胡椒鸡肉味道。

8: Nongshim Shin Ramyun Black Premium Noodle Soup – United States辛拉面Ramyun Black牌农心拉面汤（美国）

Everyone’s had Nongshim’s Shin Ramyun once. It’s spicy and full of noodles. Shin Ramyun Black contains nice big pieces of mushroom and freeze-dried beef that springs to life. Truly excellent ramyun. Made in the United States. 几乎每个人都曾吃过辛Ramyun Black牌农心拉面汤。这款泡面辛辣，面料充足，内含大块蘑菇和冻干牛肉汤包。真正上好的农心拉面产自美国。

7: Sapporo Ichiban Chow Mein – United StatesSapporo Ichiban炒面（美国）

It’s got some great noodles. They suck up all the water as they cook and once you open the seasoning packet and stir in the flavor, the smell is tantalizing. The best bonus here is the little packet of seaweed powder. It’s just right. Made in the United States.这款面的面条上好，在烹饪的时候可以吸入所有的水分，放入调料包入味之后，其味道让人垂涎三尺。最大的惊喜是附加的海藻粉小包，味道十分纯正。此款面条产于美国。

6: Myojo Ippei-chan Yakisoba Japanese Style Noodles – JapanMyojo Ippei-chan Yakisoba牌日式面条（日本）

Yakisoba, delivered wonderfully. The tray is filled with boiling water and also acts as a strainer! Great noodles, top-notch veggies – and a bonus: mayonnaise! Makes for a meal of pure deliciousness.日式炒面，包装精致便捷。饭盒既可以容纳沸水，又可以把水过滤出去！上乘的面条，一流的蔬菜，还有什么？蛋黄酱！有了它，你大可美餐一顿！

5: Indomie Curly Noodle With Grilled Chicken Flavour Special Quality Instant Noodles – Indonesia印多面烤鸡风味卷面条，精致泡面（印度尼西亚）

They got it right when they said these noodles are special. They’re broad and thin with such an enjoyable texture. The flavor is sweet, spicy and perfect. 特别，是对这款泡面最精准的描述。面条又宽又薄，质量上乘。味道甜美、辛辣，完美之至。

4: Nongshim Jinjja Jinjja Flamin’ Hot & Nutty Noodle Soup – United StatesJinjja Jinjja Flamin'牌热汤农心面（美国）

Jinjja Jinjja’s quality noodles, strong heat and unique pork, peanut and black sesame notes make this a real stand-out in the South Korean ramyun market and now here in the United States. Jinjja Jinjja牌品质面条，热汤配上风味独特的猪肉、坚果和黑芝麻，这是韩国和如今的美国拉面市场真正独树一帜的泡面。

【相关阅读】全球十大最难吃泡面：东西方口味差很大（组图）>>>

3: Indomie Mi Instan Mi Goreng Rendang – IndonesiaIndomie Mi Instan Mi Goreng Rendang 牌泡面（印度尼西亚）

A deep and rich curry flavor with just the right amount of spiciness. These noodles have a great texture and taste so good. This ‘stir noodle’ variety is superb. 厚重的咖喱风味，配上恰到好处的辣味，这款面条美味之至，好吃极了，是炒面中的极品。

2: Prima Taste Singapore Curry La Mian – Singapore新加首席品风味咖喱拉面（新加坡）

Here you’ll find the same high quality lamian noodles and a pair of packets – one of coconut powder and one of curry paste. So simple and so perfect. Truly exceptional.本款拉面的面条和调料包都很赞——调料中有一袋椰子粉和一袋咖喱酱。就是这么简单，就是这么好吃！值得品尝！

1: Prima Taste Singapore Laksa La Mian – Singapore新加坡Laksa首席风味拉面（新加坡）

Pair steamed lamian noodles with a packet of coconut powder and a packet of paste and you’ve got a real game changer here. The noodles are high quality and the broth is luxuriant; light in color with beads of chili oil float in a ballet of splendor. 蒸制拉面面条配上椰子粉加酱包调料包，你就可以尝到味道好到爆的泡面。面条质量上乘，肉料汤汁营养丰富，面条颜色浅淡，辣椒油漂浮在泡面表层，好吃极了！

【相关阅读】吃货福音！男孩爱吃泡面被美国名校录取>>>

title: “舌尖上的宿舍”走红 盘点那些好吃的泡面
